attributes.action: Scrap Speeding fines but keep penalty points
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister,

With so many drivers being of the opinion that speed cameras are allegedly being used as "cash cows" for local enforcement agencies I petition that the fines levied for this charge be only enough to cover administration charges and the penalty points currently applied remain.

This would prove to all that infact local enforcement agencies are not allegedly using speed convictions as a source of "easy money" and appease a vast majority of safe, careful drivers.

Thank you
